00005 void plot_beam_profile(Slices *Slices,
00006                        int counter,
00007                        std::string style,
00008                        std::string dirname)
00009 {
00010     // python::initialize();
00011     python::import();
00012     auto pFunc = python::import("plot_slices", "plot_beam_profile");
00013 
00014     auto pBinCenters = python::convert_double_array(Slices->bin_centers.data(),
00015                        Slices->bin_centers.size());
00016     auto pNMacropaticles = python::convert_int_array(Slices->n_macroparticles.data(),
00017                            Slices->n_macroparticles.size());
00018     auto pCounter = python::convert_int(counter);
00019     auto pStyle = python::convert_string(style);
00020     auto pDirname = python::convert_string(dirname);
00021 
00022     auto ret = PyObject_CallFunctionObjArgs(pFunc, pBinCenters, pNMacropaticles,
00023                                             pCounter, pStyle,  pDirname,
00024                                             NULL);
00025     assert(ret);
00026     // python::finalize();
00027 }

00031 void plot_beam_profile_derivative(Slices *Slices,
00032                                   int counter,
00033                                   std::string style,
00034                                   std::string dirname,
00035                                   string_vector_t modes)
00036 {
00037     python::import();
00038     auto pFunc = python::import("plot_slices", "plot_beam_profile_derivative");
00039 
00040     f_vector_2d_t x(modes.size(), f_vector_t());
00041     f_vector_2d_t derivative(modes.size(), f_vector_t());
00042     for (uint i = 0; i < modes.size(); i++) {
00043         Slices->beam_profile_derivative(x[i], derivative[i], modes[i]);
00044         // util::dump(x[i], "x\n", 5);
00045         // util::dump(derivative[i], "derivative\n");
00046     }
00047 
00048     auto pX = python::convert_double_2d_array(x);
00049     auto pDerivative = python::convert_double_2d_array(derivative);
00050 
00051     auto pModes = python::convert_string_array(modes.data(), modes.size());
00052     auto pCounter = python::convert_int(counter);
00053     auto pStyle = python::convert_string(style);
00054     auto pDirname = python::convert_string(dirname);
00055 
00056     auto ret = PyObject_CallFunctionObjArgs(pFunc, pX, pDerivative, pCounter, pStyle,
00057                                             pDirname, pModes, NULL);
00058     assert(ret);
00059 }
